item.description:
Benefit Fundraiser for Lynne Wood

“Wood” You Join Me In Supporting Her Fight Against Breast Cancer?

“You have cancer.” Imagine hearing this news, as the professional mother of two teenage children, with the kids, a career and a home to manage.  How would you win the fight against cancer, provide for your family, and keep life as “normal” as possible?  How would you meet all the expenses involved?    

Lynne Wood is a kind, hardworking, wonderful lady, known for her generous spirit, devotion to family & friends, sense of humor, and tireless work ethic.  She is known for her volunteerism, serving as Den Mother, often is the first to reach out and help others in need!  Lynne has been diagnosed with invasive lobular carcinoma, requiring surgery, chemotherapy and other related procedures and treatments.  Not only will Lynne face these trials, she must also carry the additional burden of copayments, transportation costs, and related expenses, while shouldering lost income from work leave time, yet still maintain her household.    

Lynne needs to focus on the fight against this awful disease! 

 Thank you for your generosity and your partnership in supporting Lynne’s fight against cancer.

My Friend’s Battle is MY battle.... Supporting her until she WINS!!

Dinner, Dancing, Live Entertainment,
Raffles, 50/50, Silent Auction and much more!

Tickets are 30.00 per person donation

DATE OF THIS EVENT IS MAY 1ST (1 PM - 6 PM)
item.how_to_find_us: WE HAVE ALMOST 200 PEOPLE ATTENDING, THANK YOU TO THOSE THAT CONTRIBUTED!
item.why: You can still come and pay at the door if you did not pre-pay!
item.name: Benefit Fundraiser for Lynne Wood (a special Meetup Member)
